app.title: Tent Architect
app.subtitle: Design optimized tent floor plans with precision

dashboard.heroSubtitle: Configure tent dimensions, set your inventory, and generate optimized layouts in seconds.
dashboard.newProjectDesc: Set your tent dimensions and inventory to generate optimized scenarios.
dashboard.recentProjectsDesc: Pick up where you left off or start from a template.

results.title: Floor Plan Results
results.selectScenario: Click a scenario to view details

export.title: Export Floor Plan
export.description: Export your floor plan as a high-quality PNG image including the visualization, used braces inventory, and all measurements.

zoom.level: Zoom level {{percent}}%. Click to fit to view.

validation.braceLengthInvalid: Please enter a valid positive length for brace {{index}}.
validation.braceWidthInvalid: Please enter a valid positive width for brace {{index}}.
validation.braceQuantityInvalid: Please enter a quantity of at least 1 for brace {{index}}.
validation.railLengthInvalid: Please enter a valid positive length for rail {{index}}.
validation.railQuantityInvalid: Please enter a quantity of at least 1 for rail {{index}}.
validation.tentDimensionsInvalid: Please enter valid positive tent dimensions.
validation.other: Please check the other fields and try again.

inventory.atLeastOneBrace: At least one brace type is required.
inventory.atLeastOneRail: At least one rail type is required.

calculation.noValidFloorPlan: No valid floor plan found. Insufficient inventory or tent dimensions too challenging. Add more braces to your inventory.
calculation.minSetbackGreater: Min setback cannot be greater than max setback.
calculation.tentTooSmall: Tent too small: usable area would be {{length}}m × {{width}}m.
calculation.tentTooSmallGeneric: Tent too small for the usable area.
calculation.noBracesFit: No braces can fit in the usable length. Check brace dimensions.
calculation.insufficientInventoryOrientation: No valid floor plan found. Insufficient inventory for this orientation.
calculation.tentDimensionsMinSetback: Tent dimensions must be at least {{min}}m to accommodate minimum setback.
calculation.tentDimensionsMinSetbackGeneric: Tent dimensions too small for minimum setback.
calculation.insufficientBraceArea: Insufficient brace inventory: total brace area is {{total}} m², but at least {{needed}} m² is needed. Add more braces.
calculation.insufficientBraceAreaGeneric: Insufficient brace inventory. Add more braces to your inventory.
calculation.insufficientBraceQuantity: Insufficient brace inventory: no single brace type has enough quantity to fill one column (usable length: {{usableLength}}m). Increase brace quantities or use a smaller tent.
calculation.insufficientBraceQuantityGeneric: Insufficient brace inventory. Increase brace quantities or use a smaller tent.
